nextPost.title: Pork Butt Rest in a Cooler | THIS IS HOW LONG!
nextPost.excerpt:
YOU WILL WANT TO REST A PORK BUTT IN A COOLER FOR NO LONGER THAN 12 HOURS. THAT IS A VERY GENEROUS AMOUNT OF TIME FOR ALL THE
COLLAGEN INSIDE THE MEAT TO COME DOWN TO A REASONABLE INTERNAL TEMPERATURE.
